author: Maria Elia
method: On the end of each ham slice, place a piece of mozzarella, basil leaf and a fig quarter. Drizzle with olive oil and season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper. Roll up and secure with cocktail stick. Refrigerate until required.
ingredients: 6 slices of ham, cut in half ,  1 ball buffalo mozzarella, torn into 12 pieces,  12 basil leaves,  4 char-grilled figs, quartered,  olive oil,  sea salt
